description: Unicorn Ghosts are the ultimate form of Unicorns. These deathly shades transcend the metaphysics of Solidity Law, and can apparently appear in many places simultaneously. If two or more meet in one wallet, they open the door for a legendary creature from another dimension. More info about the 'Where is my dragon?' card game here: https://whereismydragon.eth - https://whereismydragon.eth.link
name: Unicorn Ghost
